title: Mahesh Dattani calls this the darkest period yet of our democracy
text: With the number of authors in the country returning their awards and honours protesting against various things, Bengalurean playwright Mahesh Dattani took to his social networking page to give his take on the same. The playwright, who is now based in Mumbai, wrote, "People want to know whether I will return my Sahitya Akademi award. I will save that gesture to protest against further horrific injustices that are to follow. Sadly, we can see that coming. Poor people, artists, farmers, Muslims, dalits, LGBT, we must brace ourselves for the darkest period yet of our democracy."
